answers.text:
Cordell,
Below is a link to Mission Viejo, California's Make it Count Fitness Challenge.  The program is geared towards adults, not children, but the rewards are based on a point system.  The point breakdown per activity is listed on the web page and I thought you might be able to adapt this program for your purposes.  I hope this helps.  The program can be found here: 
http://cityofmissionviejo.or/DepartmentPage.aspx?id=12757

author: Cordell Reynolds
text:
Hello,
I am new to my position as a Program Development Specialist.  Due to my experience as a personal trainer, I have been commissioned the task of creating a Youth Fitness Challenge Program.  I have developed what I consider to be a great six week workout and activity regimen, however, I am having difficulties formatting the program into a challenge format and determing an appropriate point and reward system.  If anyone has any experience with a similar project, please feel free to chime in.
Thanks
Cordell Reynolds
title: Youth Fitness Programs
